qas.question: In what city and state did the arena football test game take place?
At what venue did the test game occur?
Along with the Rockford Metros, what was the name of the other team that played in the test game?
On what date did the second test game take place?
The second test game was played in what arena?

context: The test game was played in <a0_0>Rockford, Illinois<a0_0/>, at the <a1_0>Rockford MetroCentre<a1_0/>. Sponsors were secured, and players and coaches from local colleges were recruited to volunteer to play for the teams, the <a2_0>Chicago Politicians<a2_0/> and Rockford Metros, with the guarantee of a tryout should the league take off. Interest was high enough following the initial test game that Foster decided to put on a second, "showcase", game. The second game was held on <a3_0>February 26, 1987<a3_0/> at the <a4_0>Rosemont Horizon<a4_0/> in Chicago with a budget of $20,000, up from $4,000 in the test game. Foster also invited ESPN to send a film crew to the game; a highlights package aired on SportsCenter.
